description: Africa Rainfall Climatology (Version 2) is an operational rainfall climatology from 1983-present. This data is a result of a project to create a satellite-estimated precipitation climatology over the Africa domain.  The climatology has been created to compliment the daily operational rainfall estimate product (RFE) in order to generate anomaly fields over Africa over various timescales. Data resolution of the dataset are grids at a 0.1 degree resolution. Spatial extent of all estimates spans 20.0W-55.0E and 40.0S-40.0N.
name: BCLME: Precipitation
